text: Geoff Cox (born 13 March 1951) is an Australian musician and media personality. He is often referred to as Coxy. He is most notable for having played drums with Brian Cadd and with bands Cycle, The Bootleg Family Band and also Avalanche. He also filled in as drummer with the Little River Band while Derek Pellici recovered from burns following a BBQ accident. More recently he became a light entertainment presenter on the Seven Network. Currently he hosts Coxy's Big Break. Cox has been an Australia Day Ambassador. He has supported other charitable causes, including Cabrini Institute and Zoos Victoria. In 2008 Cox survived bowel cancer.
